name: LasTime I
description:
Don't let to be the LasTime! A new horror game made by one person. The game comes with very good graphics and very good game play!

(Comment to help me improve the game)

  Main Story :

As a man returns to his house in the middle of the night, he goes by mistake on the narrow street of Zangoo. When he realized that he was in the village, he ran out of gasoline.Ηe's trying to get around and find something to get out of there.But a spirit from a man who died in nuclear tests still lives there.Peter, as he is called, tries to scare Bill (The main actor) to leave his village.
